Item.Value: [Text:Oh man, I'm hungry. I should stop shopping and head to the Inn soon for a crispy snack.][Name:3][Default]
[Text:Did you know that some places I've visited seem to live off desserts? I couldn't imagine that.][Name:4][Default]
[Text:I'm so excited about this trip that I've been having a hard time sleeping. Do you think the Apothecary has something that can help?][Name:5][Default]
